about_the_game:
[Currently in development] with all features already implemented. We're continuously improving visuals and fine-tuning balance daily. It will be fully completed by release.

You’re a night-shift nurse, called out for an urgent house visit to help a deaf patient who’s had a serious fall while working on his attic. As the only one on staff who knows sign language, you’re the only hope to assist him in the late hours. At first, everything seems routine. But as you move through the quiet house, things quickly take a dark turn. strange noises from empty rooms, claw marks along the walls and A sense of dread when you believe someone's or something watching you.

Shortly before midnight, your patient vanishes--leaving only a trail. You’re not alone, and something is watching your every move.

In Watcher from the Void, a tense, stealth-based horror experience, you’ll need to gather ten pieces of a key to unlock the attic and escape. But be careful: a sinister presence roams the halls, hunting you as you search. Use coins to distract it if you’re spotted.

Find alternate routes through vents and behind locked doors as you try to avoid the creature’s path, each step pulling you deeper into the shadows of the house.

Key Features:

- Stealth and Strategy: Avoid the mysterious Watcher’s gaze as you collect key fragments needed to escape the haunted home.

- Distraction Mechanic: Toss coins to create diversions and buy yourself time to evade the relentless creature.

- Progressive Horror Atmosphere: Experience the growing dread of a house that seems to breathe with life.

- Alternative Pathways: Crawl through vents or unlock doors to outwit your pursuer and explore every shadowy corner.

Will you survive the night and escape the Watcher from the Void? Or will you become its next victim?

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu 18.04 / SteamOS 3.0 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7850 (Driver: Mesa 20.0+ or NVIDIA 450+)
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: OpenAL-compatible or PulseAudio-compatible sound device

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.13 (High Sierra) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2400 / Apple M1 or better
  • Memory: 8 MB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon Pro 560 / Intel UHD 630 or better
  • Storage: 7 MB available space
  • Sound Card: Any macOS-compatible sound device
